pages.text: 26|84|haey saum trong me tda phdal aoy khnhom nouv kar kaotasarsaer pi banda  anak chomnean kraoy phng choh .

26|88|ku now thngai del tropy sa mb tde  ning kaunchaw kmean brayoch ( champoh anaknea mneak) laey .

26|103|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong pru tde kar noh kuchea phosdo tang  muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheakochraen kmean chomnue laey .
